item.title: Easy creation of poetry from requirements.txt
item.description: Poetry and Requirements.txt I am now a poetry convert, opting for it in any reasonably large projects. Personally, I have found the ability to pin pacakges and produce a lock file invaluable for getting a complete picture of an applications dependencies. It also prevets needless docker build time spikes if a package is updated. Unfortunately, converting requirements.txt to pyproject.toml is not yet integrated natively by poetry.
